pages.text: Artificial life is a type of synthesized life that contains a spirit crystal within itself. It can use Molding Spell to cast magick, and using Molding Spell on artificial life can store them within it. Right-clicking while sneaking can clear the Molding Spell.

Artificial life must be placed on the ground to function and can be activated using red-stone signals, causing it to cast the Molding Spell stored within it. Continuous red-stone signals will keep the artificial life activated, with stronger signals causing it to cast spells slower and weaker signals causing it to cast spells faster. $(br2)Artificial life does not regenerate its own mana energy and still has a mana limit of 5000, but it can absorb mana from Mana Capacity in the surrounding area.
